task.title: How to customize click to meet?
task.shortdesc: When you click the Launch Meeting and Send Invitation button after configuring the meeting URL, an invitation message displays with a hyperlink.

context.p: You can click the link to open the meeting in a browser and append to the conversation, so it is convenient for the other party to quickly join the meeting.

step.cmd: Click the Launch Meeting and Send Invitation button to open the meeting invitation.

info.note: The icon shown in the chat window is an image representing the chosen external meeting provider.

step.cmd: The meeting opens in a browser.
Other users can see the meeting link in the chat conversation and can click it to join the meeting.
